item.title: PI pkp shop
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

You need to alter the method that handles the actual buying of items from store.

if (myShopId != 47) { //All shops that do not have the ID of 47. /* * Add whatever you're buying to invent. and remove gold. */ } else { if (pkPoints > getSpecialItemValue(selectedItem)) { addItem(selectedItem, amount); removePkPoints(getSpecialItemValue(selectedItem)); } }
